heading: HR00397
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE PROPER COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION OF THE CIRCUMSTANCES SURROUNDING THE EVENTS LAST SEPTEMBER 25, 2019 IN BORACAY AKLAN, WHERE 7 DRAGON BOAT PADDLERS LOST THEIR LIFE WHILE TRAINING
